content: this trendy crochet skirt is perfect for boasting a bit of boho flair stitched in soft and durable caron colorama bamboo blend this chevron striped skirt is worked in granny stripes featuring a dramatic color-matched fringe practice granny stripes simple shaping waistband casing and fringe techniques pick your shades to customize this showstopping garment to suit your tastes make the matching top for a coordinated look gauge 5 groups of 3 double_crochet chain 1 and 7 row = 4 10 cm in pattern materials caron® colorama™ bamboo blend 8 oz/227 g 396 yds/363 m sizes xs/s m l contrast a wheat 82006 2 2 2 balls contrast b blush 82001 2 2 2 balls xl 2/3xl 4/5xl contrast a wheat 82006 2 3 3 balls contrast b blush 82001 2 2 3 balls finished hip measurement xs/s 38 96 5 cm m 42 106 5 cm l 46 117 cm xl 50 127 cm 2/3xl 56 142 cm 4/5xl 62 157 5 cm approx length including waistband and excluding fringe 23 23-24-24-25-25 58 5 58 5-61-61-63 5-63 5 cm
